cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Component__c.name: cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Component__c
cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Component__c.description: Contains the settings for different customizable UI components in the theme.

cgc_sync__Color__c.description: Refers to the color code that's used in the mobile app. This can be a color code macro or an RGBA code.

cgc_sync__Property_Name__c.description: Unique names of the mobile app framework control to adjust the color based on themes.

cgc_sync__Property_Type__c.description: Property type of the UI component.

cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Theme__c.description: Refers to the mobile app theme.
